description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. Fight your way through hoards of un-dead skeletons all set on not letting you leave. - - - - 1 or 2 player sideways scrolling beat’em up adventure with four levels and many combos! - - - - Features a comic book style storyboard, you can also listen to the game’s music in options and look at development shots in the Gallery.
